title: Vokteren
overview: The goal is to climb the summit of Norway's national mountain, majestic Stetind (1,391 m.a.s.l.) in Narvik municipality in Nordland. On their backs, the participants each have a bag with a sum of money, in which NOK 2.1 million is divided equally between everyone. On their journey through the wilderness, they encounter surprising disputes and intense competitions and challenges, where they must make difficult and bold decisions that will affect both themselves and the group.
